traits.Bladed Hide: At the start of each of its turns, the moorbounder deals 5 (2d4) piercing damage to any creature grappling it.
traits.Standing Leap: The moorbounder's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.Multiattack: The moorbounder makes two attacks: one with its blades and one with its claws.
actions.Blades: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (4d4 + 4) slashing damage.
